titleStmt.title: Death a deliverance, or, A funeral discourse, preach'd (in part) on the decease of Mrs. Mary Doolittle, (late wife of Mr. Thomas Doolittle, minister of the Gospel in London) who departed this life the 16th of Decemb. 1692 by John Shower.
titleStmt.author: Shower, John, 1657-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abr. Chandler ... and Samuel Wade ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
